import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" import "./SignUp.modulus.css" import { FcGoogle } from "react-icons/fc" import { auth } from "../../../firebase" import { createUserWithEmailAndPassword, signInWithPopup, GoogleAuthProvider } from 'firebase/auth' import signUpImg from "../../../images/signUp.jpg" const SignUp = () => { const [email, setEmail] = useState() const [password, setPassword] = useState() const [userName, setUserName] = useState() const [phone, setPhone] = useState() const navigate = useNavigate() let googleProvider = new GoogleAuthProvider() const signUp = (e) => { e.preventDefault() createUserWithEmailAndPassword(auth, email, password) .then((userCredential) => { console.log(userCredential) navigate("/") }).catch((error) => { console.log(error) }) } const signUpWithGoogle = () => { signInWithPopup(auth, googleProvider) .then((userCredential) => { console.log(userCredential) navigate("/") }).catch((error) => { console.log(error) }) } return (

Sign Up

setEmail(e.target.value)} />
setUserName(e.target.value)} />

) } export default SignUp
